body: @pkieltyka Maybe I suck at marketing... I've made one that can remove tests here: github.com/kardianos/govendor . Not trying to promote it here, but once you have a tool that works well, adding a test filter isn't too hard. It only copies over needed or declared packages so `go install ./...` also works because main packages aren't copied over by default either. I'm sure other tools could do similar things.
